texts.text: Oh, the sky! Clouds in the day.
Stars at night.
A big storm cloud
and a small fluffy cloud.
A big flying bird
and a small flying bird.
The big bird is flying.
The small bird is singing.
The big sun and a small star.
The big sun shines
and a small star sparkles.
Oh, the sky! Clouds in the day.
Stars at night.
I wonder... Where should I go next?
Oh, the forest! The fantastic forest!
I wonder how many different things
there are in the forest.
A tall giraffe is eating leaves
from a short tree.
Big and small monkeys…
...playing with long sticks
and short sticks.
Oh, the forest! The fantastic forest!
There are so many different things
in the forest.
I wonder... Where should I go next?
Oh, the ocean! So clear and blue.
I wonder how many different things
there are in the ocean.
A big boat and a small boat.
A fast boat and a slow boat.
A happy fish dancing
and a sad fish swimming.
A big octopus with long legs
and a small octopus with short legs.
Oh, the ocean! So clear and blue.
There are so many different things
in the ocean.
I wonder... Where should I go next?
My home, I love my home!
There are so many things I love at home.
A plate full of food.
I sit on the stool! I am ready to eat.
Yum! Now I am feeling happy
and playful!
I want to see many different places
and see all kinds of different things
both night and day!
